headline: Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller Made a Huge Mistake With Nvidia
summary: Druckenmiller dumped all of his Nvidia shares last year and expressed regret afterward.  Stanley Druckenmiller has shown he's a firm believer in the future of artificial intelligence (AI), as he's invested in several companies leading in this industry.  The stock trades for 237x forward earnings estimates today, prompting some to say it's gotten too expensive and may be set for declines.
